scenario.name: Basic Sipstone UAC
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:5012345678@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: [service] <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: sip:5012345678@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Type: multipart/mixed;boundary=tkth Content-Length: [len]
--tkth Content-Type: application/sdp
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio 6030 RTP/AVP 8 119 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000 a=sendrecv m=video 6150 RTP/AVP 109 a=rtpmap:109 H264/90000 a=fmtp:109 profile-level-id=42801f; packetization-mode=1 a=sendrecv m=application 6020 UDP MCVideo c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] a=sendrecv
--tkth Content-Type: application/vnd.3gpp.mcvideo-info+xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <mcvideoinfo xmlns="urn:3gpp:ns:mcvideoInfo:1.0"> <mcvideo-Params> <mcvideo-calling-user-id type="Normal"> <mcvideoURI>sip:14889199032@tk.mcx.mnc020.mcc460.3gppnetwork.org</mcvideoURI> </mcvideo-calling-user-id> <mcvideo-request-uri type="Normal"> <mcvideoURI>sip:14889199042@tk.mcx.mnc020.mcc460.3gppnetwork.org</mcvideoURI> </mcvideo-request-uri> <mcvideo-calling-group-id type="Normal"> <mcvideoURI>sip:5089100210@tk.mcx.mnc020.mcc460.3gppnetwork.org</mcvideoURI> </mcvideo-calling-group-id> <session-type>prearranged</session-type> <emergency-ind type="Normal"> <mcvideoBoolean>false</mcvideoBoolean> </emergency-ind> </mcvideo-Params> </mcvideoinfo>
--tkth--

ACK sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:5012345678@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: [service] <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 ACK Contact: sip:5012345678@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0

BYE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: [service] <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 BYE Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0
